txt.en: Trolls are a particularly deadly threat to the dwarves. Capable of smashing the strongest fortifications and thriving in the dark underground domains where the sun poses no danger, they have often been used to spearhead major assaults against the dwarf-kingdoms.
The dwarves have refined troll-hunting to an art -- but it will always be a deadly affair battling creatures against which you are roughly the right size and shape to be a football.
